  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120297</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120297</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sila in navor v ravnovesju</string>
            <string language="en">The Force and Torque for Equilibrium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kraft und die Drehkraft für Gleichgewicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La force et le couple pour l'équilibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A força e o torque para o equilíbrio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La forza e la coppia di torsione per equilibrio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δύναμη και η ροπή για την ισορροπία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La fuerza y el esfuerzo de torsión para el 
equilibrio</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Tog drog leži na mizi in nanj delujejo določene sile, ki povzročajo navor.</string>
            <string language="en">Rigid rod is laying on a table and difference forces are applied to it that are causing torque.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">navor</string>
            <string language="en">torque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravnovesje sil</string>
            <string language="en">mechanic equilibrium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">statika</string>
            <string language="en">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steife Stange legt auf eine Tabelle und 
Unterschiedkräfte werden an ihr aufgewendet, die Drehkraft 
verursachen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La tige rigide s'étend sur une table et des 
forces de différence sont appliquées à elle qui causent le couple.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A haste rígida está colocando em uma tabela e 
as forças da diferença são-lhe aplicadas que estão causando o 
torque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'asta rigido sta ponendo su una tabella e le 
forze di differenza sono applicate ad esso che stanno causando la 
coppia di torsione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η άκαμπτη ράβδος βάζει σε έναν πίνακα και οι 
δυνάμεις διαφοράς εφαρμόζονται σε τον ότι προκαλεί τη ροπή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La barra rígida está poniendo en un vector y 
las fuerzas de la diferencia se aplican a él que están causando el 
esfuerzo de torsión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drehkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechanikergleichgewicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équilibre de mécanicien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">torque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equilíbrio do mecânico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">coppia di torsione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equilibrio del meccanico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ροπή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανική ισορροπία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στατική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">esfuerzo de torsión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">equilibrio del mecánico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">statics</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
